p: As part of the Auvergne-Rh√¥ne-Alpes (ARA) regional surveillance, 229 samples collected between 2 February and 12 April 2020 were sequenced by the French National Reference Center of Respiratory Viruses. These samples originated mainly from the Hospices Civils de Lyon (HCL) (149 sequences from 58 units within 11 different hospital sites), with some from other hospitals in the Lyon area (24 sequences) and other regional hospitals (56 sequences, 12 cities).
